entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
